charges.charge_disposition: 96 months imprisonment on Ct 1; 60 months imprisonment on Ct 2, consecutive to Ct 1, for a total sentence of 156 months. 5 years supervised release. $200 special assessment. Restitution to Key Bank of Maine in the amt of $1,436.78, joint &; several. Deft remanded to custody of USM.; AMENDED JUDGMENT: Imprisonment reduced to 60 months on Count 1 and 60 months on Count 2, to be served consecutively, for a total sentence of 120 months. (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:1951.F Use of a Firearm During a Crime of Violence (2)
